last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Judgement
last_episode_to_air.overview: A new prosecutor begins. Salazar triangulates phone records. The judge orders a reenactment at the tunnel and makes a ruling on Jessy and Laura's case.

name: Crime Diaries: Night Out
overview: After going to a Halloween party, college student Luis Andrés Colmenares is found dead. Was it an accident or murder? Inspired by true events.

episodes.name: A Dark Halloween Night
episodes.overview: After a night of Halloween partying with friends and a new love, college student Luis Andrés Colmenares mysteriously goes missing.

episodes.name: A Mother Seeks Justice
episodes.overview: As days, weeks and months pass, Oneida demands answers from prosecutors and gets a tip from the dead. Visions of Luis Andrés haunt Laura.

episodes.name: When Bodies Talk
episodes.overview: Luis's body is exhumed. González's interrogations intensify after an incriminating letter is found. Journalist Salazar pitches the story to his editor.

episodes.name: Pain, Justice, and Ideals
episodes.overview: Laura and Jessy's bail hearing begins, triggering a media blitz. Oneida's mother advises she let go of Luis. A social media comment catches Jorge's eye.

episodes.name: A Rumor in Los Cerros
episodes.overview: González focuses his attention on Carlos Cárdenas and is then himself targeted. Salazar gets a surprise at work. Oneida worries about her son's soul.

episodes.name: A Witness Appears
episodes.overview: A new eyewitness comes forward saying he saw a beating in the wee hours of Halloween. A murder suspect is arrested. Salazar interviews Laura Moreno.

episodes.name: A Hole in the Story
episodes.overview: Salazar shares his doubts that Luis Andrés death was murder. Ramsés starts to distrust González, who makes a bold claim during Cárdenas's first hearing.

episodes.name: The Final Judgement
episodes.overview: A new prosecutor begins. Salazar triangulates phone records. The judge orders a reenactment at the tunnel and makes a ruling on Jessy and Laura's case.
